A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The frustrating aspect of this film is that it had all the ingredients to be a great film but failed to put them all together. As a great Star Wars fan I left the theater very disappointed. There was no set tone. It tried to be serious yet threw in humor at every serious film. \n      Some parts were very awkward and either could have been done better or cut from the film entirely. It is wrong to rate this film next to empire. It is more suited to be rated next to Attack of the Clones.
